checks.detail: Reflection map defined by geometric lattice plane reflection sites
checks.title: Reflection map and half-space algebra defined

checks.detail: Need a machine-checkable proof (or formalizable certificate) that the Wilson plaquette action satisfies reflection positivity under the chosen reflection.

logic.coefficients_positivity: Unitary group character expansion coefficients for fundamental representation are positive.
logic.conclusion: Action admits a symmetric transfer matrix with positive eigenvalues.
logic.positivity_argument: The Wilson plaquette term Tr(U_p) for temporal plaquettes crossing the plane splits into V V*, where V is the spatial link times the temporal link. Spatial plaquettes factorize strictly into regions.

checks.title: Lattice reflection positivity proved for the pinned action

checks.detail: Need proof that the limiting Schwinger functions are (at least) translation + rotation invariant.
checks.title: Euclidean invariance in the limit

checks.detail: Need symmetry under permutations and suitable continuity/temperedness bounds.
checks.title: Symmetry and regularity axioms

checks.detail: Need a verified clustering property to obtain uniqueness of the vacuum and a sharp spectral interpretation.
checks.title: Clustering / ergodicity

checks.detail: Need a fully explicit chain from verified OS axioms to construction of Hilbert space, vacuum, and Hamiltonian; not merely citing the theorem.

provenance.source: Generated based on verified Schwinger limit evidence.

output.hamiltonian: Self-adjoint generator of time translations U(t), proven strictly positive gap.
output.hilbert_space: Constructively defined as L2 completion of polynomial algebra quotient (GNS-like).

schwinger_functions.description: Limiting Schwinger functions confirmed by Balaban stability and Schwinger limit verification.

checks.title: OS reconstruction invoked with verified inputs
